forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 16 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 5 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
As morning unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle tranquility blankets the city. The sky reveals itself as mostly sunny, a soft light filtering through, hinting at a high near 61. A brisk west wind stirs, whispering through the streets, carrying the exhilaration of a new day, while gusts can tease at moments, reminding residents of the Bay’s playful nature. The atmosphere, though initially cool, invites wanderers to step outside, perhaps donning a light jacket to ward off the morning chill.

Tonight promises a continuation of this clarity, morphing into a mostly clear night with temperatures settling around 51. The winds will soften, inviting anyone who wishes to stroll along the waterfront, perhaps savoring a quiet coffee or meandering through the streets illuminated by city lights. The absence of fog allows for moments of reflection as one gazes toward the iconic silhouettes of the Golden Gate Bridge. With the weather as gracious as it is, this day offers a chance not just for errands, but for small adventures: perhaps a visit to one of the city’s hidden parks or a leisurely walk through the historic streets.
